title: Pereira (Father Eduardo Clemente Nunes)
body: He was born in the parish of Camara de Lôbos on November 23, 1887, and was ordained as a priest in the Republic's mainland in 1913. He was a teacher at the Funchal lyceum and has collaborated in various newspapers in this city. His works include: *Delenda est Carthago*, speech, 1913, 37 pages; *Golpes*, collection of poems, 1914, 151 pages; *Manual of Our Lady of Carmo and Saint Thereza*, translation, 323 pages; *How to Win*, 1 volume and *Ilhas de Zargo*, 2 volumes.
